resources.string: 菜单在临时表面上显示选项列表。当用户与按钮、操作或其他控件交互时，它们就会出现.

string.name: show_menu
string.description: Label for button that shows the menu [CHAR_LIMIT=20].

string.name: menu_with_icons
string.description: Text to indicate button below shows a menu with icons [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE].

string.name: menu
string.description: Text to indicate button below shows a menu [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE].

string.name: context_menu
string.description: label for section where the context menu is featured [CHAR_LIMIT=20].

string.name: list_popup_window
string.description: Text to indicate button below shows a ListPopupWindow [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE].

resources.string:
Material 主题中的菜单将默认使用 textAppearanceSubtitle1 的文本样式。 

 菜单背景添加顶部和底部填充、圆角和 8dp 标高。 

 您可以尝试此演示中的弹出菜单、上下文菜单或溢出菜单。

string.name: menu_context_menu_description
string.description: Text explaining how to use context menus [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE].

resources.string: 长按此 TextView 时会打开上下文菜单。 \n\n它提供影响所选内容或上下文框架的操作。

string.name: context_menu_highlight
string.description: text for a menu option to highlight text [CHAR_LIMIT=20].
